name: Calamity (Arif Rahman)
description:
A  level game of combat and platforming in VR. What's unique about this game is you can switch between 4 perspective; close 3rd-person, far 3rd-person, fixed cam resident evil style, and  regular first person vr perspective. The game is controlled with a regular gamepad controllers instead of vr hand controllers.
